data_annot.description: This metric assesses the annotation process used for the dataset, focusing on who performed the annotations and their level of expertise.

Single Human Expert.description: Data annotation is conducted by a single human annotator who is either a subject matter expert or a member of the target demographic. If there is no information about the annotator, then the annotator is not an expert.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where this is described (e.g., 'Section 3.1').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the data annotation was performed by a single human expert.

Multiple Human Experts.description: Data annotation is performed by multiple human annotators with subject matter expertise or belonging to the target demographic. If there is no information about the annotators, then the annotators are not experts.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where this is described (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the data annotation involved multiple human experts.

Single Human Non-Expert.description: Data annotation is conducted by a single human annotator without subject matter expertise.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where this is described (e.g., 'Section 3.3').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the data annotation was done by a single non-expert.

Multiple Human Non-Experts.description: Data annotation is conducted by multiple human annotators who do not possess subject matter expertise.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where this is described (e.g., 'Section 3.4').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the data annotation involved multiple non-expert annotators.

AI Model with Verification.description: Data annotation is performed by an AI model with verification using some human annotations.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where this is described (e.g., 'Section 3.5').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the data annotation is done by AI model with some verifications.

AI Model without Verification.description: Data annotation is performed by an AI model without any verification of its quality.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where this is described (e.g., 'Section 3.6').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why an AI model was used for data annotation without any verification.

Automatic.description: Data annotation is automatically done by a simulation or automatic process that is not an AI model.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where this is described (e.g., 'Section 3.6').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the data annotation is done by an automatic process or simulation.

N/A.description: No data annotation is applied, or none is documented.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if no data annotation is described or performed. If true, reasoning must be provided.

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why no data annotation process is considered present.
